summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lucky Wheel updates: wheel redesign with white/cream segments and gold styling, dragon image wrapper, purple pointer, and admin password change functionality. All backend APIs working, frontend design successfully updated.

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent session timeout during repeated admin logins in testing

passed_tests: Backend - Change password with valid current password
Backend - Change password error handling for invalid current password
Backend - Code generation and spin functionality
Frontend - Wheel design updated to white/cream segments with gold dividers
Frontend - Purple pointer visible at top of wheel
Frontend - Dragon image wrapping around wheel
Frontend - Gold center medallion with dragon kanji
Frontend - Settings tab visible for both master and regular admin
Frontend - Change password form with all required fields
Frontend - Main page spin form error handling working
Integration - Admin login and dashboard access working
